name: My Super Tower 2
description:
My Super Tower II is a classic Tower Defence with a minimalist 3D graphics.

Your goal is to protect your castle from the enemy waves by using different types of towers and skills.

The game is present the company with the storyline, as well as being an endless game mode - with a number of level (it is planned to add new levels in the future) and Ballance thought that is constantly being finalized.Features:
  • Different levels of a single company
  • Different types of enemies, including a mini-boss and Boss
  • Several types of towers with the possibility of improving the protection of the fortress
  • Various skills that will assist you in the most difficult moments of the game
  • Nice Low-Poly schedule
